sec.p:
Spectral analyses were carried out with the Analyseries software package
55 (Fig. 4c). Blackman-Tukey spectra (30% lag) using a Bartlett window with a bandwidth of 0.00702905 are shown in Fig. 4c. The amplitudes of the spectra were normalized. The δ 18O and residual nssSO 4 2− data used for the spectral analysis were resampled at a 200-yr interval using linear interpolation. For resampling, δ 18O data from
14 and residual nssSO 4 2− data provided in the Source Data file were used.
